sentences.en: "We'll all be arrested!" Thomas yelled, which was most unlike him.
sentences.cn: “我们都会被抓的！”托马斯大声嚷道，跟平时的他判若两人。

sentences.en: Apartment 46 was a quiet apartment, unlike the one above it.
sentences.cn: 和它楼上的那间不同，46号公寓很安静。

sentences.en: He was firm and steady unlike other men she knew.
sentences.cn: 他坚定可靠，和她认识的其他男人不一样。

sentences.en: Hybrids, unlike pure electric cars, never need to be plugged in.
sentences.cn: 与纯电动汽车不同，混合动力车永远不需要接电源。

sentences.en: It was unlike Gordon to display his feelings.
sentences.cn: 戈登不太可能表露他的情感。

sentences.en: It's unlike him to be late; he's usually on time.
sentences.cn: 他不是会迟到的那种人, 他通常很准时.

sentences.en: Like poles repel, unlike poles attract.
Music is quite unlike any other art form.
sentences.cn: 音乐与其他艺术形式迥然不同。

sentences.en: Now I see that, unlike her, they were my positive models.
sentences.cn: 现在我知道了，那些人不像她，他们是我的正面的表率。

sentences.en: Tammy was unlike any other woman I have ever known.
sentences.cn: 塔米和我认识的其他女人都不一样。

sentences.en: The difference is not unlike between heaven and earth.
The doll-like figures in these stories are unlike anybody, let alone oneself.
sentences.cn: 这些故事中的玩偶形象跟谁都不像，更不用说像自己了。

sentences.en: The Swiss economy is a case apart; unlike any other.
sentences.cn: 瑞士经济是个独特的例子, 不同于其他的经济形式.

sentences.en: They are both teachers. Otherwise they are quite unlike.
sentences.cn: 他们两位都是教师；除此之外他们迥然不同。

sentences.en: This was a foreign country, so unlike San Jose.
sentences.cn: 这是外国，与圣何塞很不一样。

sentences.en: Unlike aerobics, walking entails no expensive fees for classes or clubs.
sentences.cn: 散步不像有氧健身操那样需要交纳昂贵的费用来参加健身班或俱乐部。

sentences.en: Unlike his more famous namesake, this Bill Clinton has little interest in politics.
sentences.cn: 这位比尔∙克林顿和那位著名的同名人不同，对政治没什么兴趣。

sentences.en: Unlike wine, brandy matures only in wood, not glass.
sentences.cn: 和葡萄酒不同的是，白兰地只能在木制容器而非玻璃容器里酿制。

words.tran_cn: 不可信；未必有；不大可能的事

trans.tran_cn: 不像，与…不同，与…平时不同
trans.tran_en: completely different from a particular person or thing
